      • rotate

        public static PointF rotate(PointF point,
            PointF origin,
            float cos,
            float sin)
        Rotate a Point object around another Point object

        The new coordinates are set in point

        Parameters:
        point - the point to rotate
        origin - the point around which to rotate
        cos - the cosine of the rotation angle
        sin - the sine of the rotation angle
        Returns:
        The new coordinate of point
